context_bundle.summary: File message bump protocol. Send lone $ to recipient window to signal new file message waiting in inbox. Fallback when MCP/carbyne unavailable.

onboarding.quick_start: When using file-based messaging, send $ to recipient's window via AHK clipboard paste to notify them. DC->KALIC: Paste $ to KALIC terminal. KALIC->DC: Paste $ to Claude window (140px from bottom click).
common_patterns: $ sent via AHK = check file inbox
Use clipboard paste (^v) + Enter, not Send
known_errors: AHK Send fails on terminals, use clipboard paste
Must wait for AHK to finish before deleting script
Click position 140px from bottom for Claude window
